nodes.text: Trilogy-3, alternatively known as Trilogy3, was a RPG scenario released by the RPGA for play as part of the Star Wars: Warriors of the Republic campaign. Despite Star Wars: Warriors of the Republic later being licensed by Wizards of the Coast, the scenario utilised West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition, Revised and Expanded rules. The scenario took place during the Imperial Period.
